name: places/ChIJS7S1Mab3wokRYMfQCR1Who0
formattedAddress: 795 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 795 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: Would like to give ZERO!! stars, based on my last experience @CVS.  I made an appointment on line for CVS located @795 Columbus Ave inside the Target.  I received both text and email confirmations for the requested vaccine appointment.  I arrived more than 10 minutes early as recommended in the appointment confirmations.  I was very perplexed, and confused to find the gates to the pharmacy closed.  I pulled my phone to confirm the date, time, and place.  All were correct.  I noticed signage around the pharmacy stating the pharmacy was open until 7 pm.  I was there at 5:45 for a 6 pm appointment.  I asked a Target associate who was busy, stocking shelves why the pharmacy was closed.  He said he was sorry, but this pharmacy is NEVER open.  He was unable to provide me with details because the pharmacy section is a separate entity from Target.  CVS rents the space.  I called customer service to try to ascertain what happened.  I doubt I am the only person this has happened to.  I was told my complaint would be directed to someone more senior than the representative I spoke with.  After a week, I  am still waiting for a response.  I see how CVS values customers, which is not at all.

originalText.text: I like this pharmacy. People complain about the hours but they clearly state that between 1:30pm-2:00pm (or 1:00pm-1:30pm, I can’t remember)  they are closed to allow their staff to have lunch. I love the gentleman that is always pretty much there, he always remembers my name, and is nice. The other young lady that works there leaves a lot to be desired. She always has a face like she doesn’t want to be bothered and then responds to you in the same way. She can learn a lot from her coworker. Her attitude is just stank. That’s the reason for 3 stars. Other than that, having this pharmacy here on 97 Columbus Avenue is a great convenience especially since the rite aid on Columbus and 96 closed.

originalText.text: Seriously the best on the upper west. There is never a line and they’re so efficient. Also, the pharmacists are super nice and professional. I feel like most people don’t know there’s a cvs inside the target here. I always choose to pick up meds and get vaccines here. In and out in a minute.

I feel like most people don’t know there’s a cvs inside the target here. I always choose to pick up meds and get vaccines here. In and out in a minute.

originalText.text: Wow, I must say, this CVS located within Target has truly been an exceptional and highly professional pharmacy. The two pharmacists, named Artom and layla, have made my visit incredibly enjoyable  Their vibrant personalities and expertise in the field have transformed this ordinary pharmaceutical retail encounter into an extraordinary  experience.--

originalText.text:
As is true with most businesses, this rating is based on a single staff member. It is the CVS pharmacist.  I don’t know his name)shame on me!), but he always remembers my wife and mine. He reminds us when refills are coming up and is always charming and pleasant.
He makes this CVS pharmacy a real pleasure.
Chris and Helga.
